item.title: Technical Machine gets $1M to let web developers play with the ...
item.description: Technical Machines wants to take a connected microcontroller that runs JavaScript and eliminate the barriers between web development and the internet of things, and jsut raised $1 million to do so. ... Chris Matthieu, a manager in the Emerging Technologies section at Bechtel, has built a project called Skynet, that lets people build and see connected devices on a network using Node.js. He calls it IM for the internet of things. Other efforts, like Node Red from IBM, which offers people ...
